title: Origin Of Species
description: Probably you already noticed it, but until now I haven’t written one word about the origin of life. The Evolution Theory of today does, but NI+ExT not. Why not? Simply because I can’t think about any possible process that could bring dead materials alive. It is way easier to go from something to everything than to go from nothing to something.
